# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power generation facility at x=-9.5 to x=-2.5
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) - working, producing water
- Boiler (x=-6.5, y=0.0) - now fueled with coal (28 remaining), producing steam
- Steam engine (x=-2.5, y=0.5) - working, connected to power network
- Pipe network (system 1487/1488) connecting all components

### Oil production facility at x=17.5 to x=37.5
Consists of:
- Pumpjack (x=17.5, y=40.5) - now placed and powered, producing crude oil
- Oil refinery (x=27.5, y=40.5) - powered, set to BasicOilProcessing, showing FLUID_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE
- Storage tank (x=32.5, y=40.5) - empty
- Chemical plant (x=37.5, y=40.5) - powered, set to PlasticBar recipe, showing ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE
- Wooden chest with coal (x=37.5, y=37.5) - contains 140 coal
- Inserter (x=37.5, y=38.5) - powered but waiting for source items
- Connected pipe network from pumpjack to refinery (system 1492)

## ERROR TIPS

### Fluid system configuration errors
- Refinery shows FLUID_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE despite connected pumpjack:
  - Verify refinery input connection points (x=28.5 y=43.5) are properly connected
  - Check pipe directionality and fluid flow direction
  - Ensure pumpjack output is reaching refinery input

### Chemical plant operation issues
- Chemical plant shows ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE for coal:
  - Verify inserter is correctly configured to move coal from chest
  - Check inserter pickup/drop positions (currently reversed)
  - Ensure chemical plant input slots are accessible

### Power distribution problems
- Pumpjack briefly showed NO_POWER status:
  - Verify all power poles between steam engine and pumpjack are connected
  - Check power network coverage in oil facility area

### Entity placement mistakes
- Repeated attempts to place pumpjack while too far away:
  - Always move within 10 tiles before placing entities
  - Verify position is clear before placement attempts

### Previous errors still applicable:
- Pipe connection verification (check all connections sequentially)
- Production monitoring (verify refinery output before connecting downstream)
- Entity inspection (check fluid contents before connection attempts)
- Inserter configuration (verify pickup/drop positions)
